00027    /*
00028    * Constructor.
00029    */
00030    AtomMSD::AtomMSD(System& system) 
00031     : SystemDiagnostic<System>(system),
00032       outputFile_(),
00033       accumulator_(),
00034       truePositions_(),
00035       oldPositions_(),
00036       shifts_(),
00037       speciesId_(-1),
00038       atomId_(-1),
00039       nMolecule_(-1),
00040       capacity_(-1),
00041       isInitialized_(false)
00042    {}
00043 
00044    /*
00045    * Read parameters from file, and allocate data array.
00046    */
00047    void AtomMSD::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00048    {
00049 
00050       // Read interval and parameters for AutoCorrArray
00051       readInterval(in);
00052       readOutputFileName(in);
00053       read<int>(in, "speciesId", speciesId_);
00054       read<int>(in, "atomId", atomId_);
00055       read<int>(in, "capacity", capacity_);
00056 
00057       // Validate parameters
00058       if (speciesId_ < 0)
00059          UTIL_THROW("Negative speciesId");
00060       if (speciesId_ >= system().simulation().nSpecies()) 
00061          UTIL_THROW("speciesId > nSpecies");
00062       if (atomId_ < 0)
00063          UTIL_THROW("Negative atomId");
00064       if (capacity_ <= 0)       
00065          UTIL_THROW("Negative capacity");
00066 
00067       Species* speciesPtr = &system().simulation().species(speciesId_);
00068 
00069       if (atomId_ >= speciesPtr->nAtom()) 
00070          UTIL_THROW("atomId >= nAtom");
00071 
00072       // Maximum possible number of molecules of this species
00073       int speciesCapacity = speciesPtr->capacity();
00074 
00075       // Allocate local arrays
00076       truePositions_.allocate(speciesCapacity);
00077       oldPositions_.allocate(speciesCapacity);
00078       shifts_.allocate(speciesCapacity);
00079 
00080       // Allocate memory for the AutoCorrArray accumulator
00081       accumulator_.setParam(speciesCapacity, capacity_);
00082 
00083       isInitialized_ = true;
00084    }
00085 
00086    /*
00087    * Initialize at beginning of simulation.
00088    */
00089    void AtomMSD::setup() 
00090    {
00091       if (!isInitialized_) {
00092          UTIL_THROW("Error: object is not initialized");
00093       }
00094 
00095       // Set number of molecules of this species in the System. 
00096       nMolecule_ = system().nMolecule(speciesId_);
00097       accumulator_.setNEnsemble(nMolecule_);
00098       accumulator_.clear();
00099 
00100       // Store initial positions, and set initial shift vectors.
00101       Vector r;
00102       IntVector  zero(0);
00103       for (int i = 0; i < nMolecule_; ++i) {
00104          r = system().molecule(speciesId_, i).atom(atomId_).position();
00105          system().boundary().shift(r);
00106          oldPositions_[i] = r;
00107          shifts_[i] = zero;
00108       }
00109 
00110    }
00111 
00112    /*
00113    * Evaluate end-to-end vectors of all chains, add to ensemble.
00114    */
00115    void AtomMSD::sample(long iStep) 
00116    { 
00117       if (!isAtInterval(iStep)) return;
00118 
00119       // Confirm that nMolecule has remained constant, and nMolecule > 0.
00120       if (nMolecule_ <= 0) {
00121          UTIL_THROW("nMolecule <= 0");
00122       }
00123       if (nMolecule_ != system().nMolecule(speciesId_)) {
00124          UTIL_THROW("Number of molecules has changed.");
00125       }
00126 
00127       Vector     r;
00128       IntVector  shift;
00129       Vector     lengths = system().boundary().lengths();
00130       int        i, j;
00131       for (i = 0; i < nMolecule_; ++i) {
00132 
00133          r = system().molecule(speciesId_, i).atom(atomId_).position();
00134          system().boundary().shift(r);
00135 
00136          // Compare current r to previous position, oldPositions_[i]
00137          system().boundary().distanceSq(r, oldPositions_[i], shift);
00138 
00139          // If this atom crossed a boundary, increment its shift vector
00140          shifts_[i] += shift;
00141 
00142          // Reconstruct true position
00143          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00144             truePositions_[i][j] = r[j] + shifts_[i][j]*lengths[j];
00145          }
00146 
00147          // Store current position in box for comparison to next one
00148          oldPositions_[i] = r;
00149   
00150       }
00151       accumulator_.sample(truePositions_);
00152 
00153    }
00154 
00156    void AtomMSD::output() 
00157    {  
00158 
00159       // Output parameters
00160       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".prm"), outputFile_);
00161       writeParam(outputFile_); 
00162       outputFile_ << std::endl;
00163       outputFile_ << std::endl;
00164       outputFile_ << "nMolecule      " << accumulator_.nEnsemble() 
00165                   << std::endl;
00166       outputFile_ << "buffercapacity " << accumulator_.bufferCapacity()  
00167                   << std::endl;
00168       outputFile_ << "nSample        " << accumulator_.nSample() 
00169                   << std::endl;
00170       outputFile_ << std::endl;
00171       //outputFile_ << "Format of *.dat file:" << std::endl;
00172       //outputFile_ << "[i]  [MSD]" << std::endl;
00173       outputFile_.close();
00174 
00175       // Output statistical analysis to separate data file
00176       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00177       accumulator_.output(outputFile_); 
00178       outputFile_.close();
00179 
00180    }
